title: Justin Ji
main_content: Hi! I’m Justin, AKA Juji. I’m a junior studying Computer Science at Harvard University (c/o 2026). I’m interested in AI research and building products that leave a lasting impact. In my free time, I enjoy playing volleyball, reading, and eating Chipotle. Read more about me ! Contact me You can reach me via LinkedIn (preferred) or email . Always happy to meet new people!
